name: cursor-augment-solution
description: Cursor Augment设备限制解决方案

scripts.dev: echo 🚀 启动完整开发环境... && npm run install-all && concurrently --names "后端,客户端" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "cd modules/admin-backend && npm run dev" "cd modules/desktop-client && npm run dev"
scripts.server:start: echo 🚀 启动自动更新ngrok服务... && node scripts/server/start-server-with-auto-update.js
scripts.build:release: echo 🚀 本地构建应用... && npm run build:update-config && npm run build:status && node scripts/build-and-release.js
scripts.build:release:publish: echo 🚀 构建并发布到GitHub... && npm run build:update-config && npm run build:status && node scripts/build-and-release.js --publish
scripts.server:stop: echo 🛑 停止远程控制服务... && node scripts/server/stop-server.js
scripts.build:update-config: echo 🔄 更新github、本地、客户端ngrok配置... && node scripts/setup/update-build-config.js
scripts.build:status: echo 📊 检查配置github、本地、客户端, ngrok地址状态... && node scripts/setup/update-build-config.js --status
scripts.cleanup: echo 🧹 清理所有进程... && taskkill /F /IM node.exe 2>nul || echo 无node进程 && taskkill /F /IM ngrok.exe 2>nul || echo 无ngrok进程 && echo ✅ 清理完成
scripts.workflow:rebuild: echo 🧹 清理ngrok进程... && taskkill /IM ngrok.exe /F 2>nul || echo 无ngrok进程需要清理 && echo 🚀 完整重建工作流程... && node scripts/workflow/rebuild-client.js
scripts.build:force: echo 🔥 强制构建（忽略Git状态）... && node scripts/build-and-release.js --force
scripts.config:update: echo 🔄 更新客户端配置... && node scripts/setup/update-client-config.js
scripts.config:verify: echo 🔍 验证配置状态... && node scripts/test/verify-config.js
scripts.test:workflow: echo 🧪 用户工作流程测试... && node scripts/test/test-user-workflow.js
scripts.test:github: echo 🧪 测试GitHub配置... && node scripts/test/test-github-config.js
scripts.check:env: echo 🔍 环境检测... && node scripts/utils/check-environment.js
scripts.clean:full: echo 🧹 完整清理（构建文件+数据+缓存）... && node scripts/build/clean-build.js && npm run data:clear-force && npm cache clean --force && echo ✅ 完整清理完成！
scripts.data:clear: echo 🗑️ 清理服务端数据... && cd modules/admin-backend && npm run clear-data
scripts.data:clear-force: echo 🗑️ 强制清理服务端数据... && cd modules/admin-backend && npm run clear-data-force
scripts.organize: echo 🗂️ 整理根目录文件... && node scripts/utils/organize-root-files.js
scripts.restore: echo 🔄 恢复根目录文件... && node scripts/utils/restore-root-files.js
scripts.workflow:quick: echo ⚡ 快速重建... && npm run config:update && cd modules/desktop-client && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd modules/admin-backend && npm install && cd ../desktop-client && npm install
scripts.server-only: echo 🌐 启动远程控制服务器... && cd modules/admin-backend && npm run dev
scripts.quick-start: echo ⚡ 快速启动（跳过依赖检查）... && concurrently --names "后端,客户端" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "cd modules/admin-backend && npm run dev" "cd modules/desktop-client && npm run dev"
scripts.build-and-deploy: echo 🚀 构建并部署... && npm run build:release && npm run server:start
scripts.setup: echo 📦 安装所有依赖... && npm run install-all && echo ✅ 安装完成！运行 npm run dev 启动开发环境
scripts.full-deploy: echo 🌐 完整部署流程... && npm run build:update-config && npm run build:release:publish && npm run server:start

author: Developer
